comments.body:
We just want to `null` and `undefined`, right? Should this be?
```suggestion
  if (item._idleNext != null) {
```

The reason that I didn't do it like you suggested was because now it's identical to the `LinkedList` code, which is used for the timeout/interval path. 
https://github.com/nodejs/node/blob/master/lib/internal/linkedlist.js#L15
